text: <@U7SL518D6> is possible add the link to the website pages into the developer menu?

Yes it’s completely possible. the only reason I didn’t include it, is I felt in both places that you’d generally want it, it was already sort of convenient, but that isn’t necessarily true any more when you’re already in the back end, it’s now hidden as a third level item.

I try to be careful about which things I add to that menu too to prevent it from getting too large to the point it becomes no longer useful.

Been planning to re-order that list a little bit based on the analytics of how often everyone uses different things. maybe I’ll finally get that update in too
I understand, but it’s a bit annoying have the hubdb and dm link
and no the pages one, have always to go to marketing -> website -> website pages
understood, we’ll get that in, that will probably hit the beta channel this week.

Lots of bug fixes coming to Beta soon.

Small performance improvements as well
